thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: Krisztina

author: Krisztina
title: Krisztina
text: I am very satisfied with the service also with the customer service - issues/order management through phone,etc. Good price for the service and like the meter reading reminder so much. Only query I have is that the day and night rates related time specification is not visible properly. I still couldn't find it anywhere though it should be clearly stated on the website and on the contract as well. Thanks a lot and all the best.
